title: Method for predicting the size of Ni<sub>1/3</sub>Mn<sub>1/3</sub>Co<sub>1/3</sub>(OH)<sub>2</sub> particles precipitated in a stirred-tank semi-batch crystallizer using CFD and particle agglomeration models

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7
